name: Beauty by Earth Self Tanner - USA Made with Natural & Organic Ingredients, Moisturizing Self Tanning Lotion with Aloe Vera & Coconut for a Natural Glow, Streak-Free Fake Tan, Medium to Dark
about_this_item: A NATURAL, SUN-KISSED GLOW: Goodbye to orange hues and hello to a natural-looking tan. Our bronzing tanning lotion comes in fair to medium & medium to dark shades for all skin types.
CLEAN BEAUTY: Trust Beauty by Earth for a natural self tanner organic made with organic aloe vera, shea butter, and botanical extracts without any harmful additives or dyes.
SUITABLE FOR FACE & BODY: Our organic tanning lotion can be used on both face and body for a seamless, all-over tan. For acne-prone skin, use our tanner lotion for glowing skin.
OPTIONS FOR EVERYONE: We offer a variety of USA-made best self tanning lotions and formats, including mousse, spray tan, tanning drops, tanning mist, and more. Find your perfect match!

EASY APPLICATION, NO STREAKS: Our best self tanner for body is easy to apply & goes on clear, without leaving any streaks or patches. You'll have a beautiful, even tan in no time. And no staining your sheets or clothes!
LONG-LASTING RESULTS: Our natural tanning lotion self tanner delivers a beautiful tan that lasts for days. With proper care, maintain your gorgeous glow without any sun damage.

title: I‚Äôm obsessed
content: I have used a different tanning mousse, but wanted to try something cleaner.  I ordered the lotion & was pretty impressed with the color.  I don‚Äôt love the ‚Äústicky‚Äù feeling of the lotion, but it works great.  I ended up getting the mousse in this brand & was disappointed in the lack of color it gave me. I went back to using the lotion only to realize that I am very allergic to something in the lotion.  I didn‚Äôt realize it was related the first application.  I used it for the second time & ended up with the same red, itchy rash as the first one.  It didn‚Äôt show up the day of, but the next day when I woke up.  I do have very sensitive skin, but find it comical that the ‚Äúclean‚Äù version is the one that I am allergic to.  I‚Äôm not sure if I will try out the mousse again or just move on.  I‚Äôm super sad because I did like the color it gave me, but it isn‚Äôt worth the 2-3 days of redness & itching on my arms & chest.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2024

title: Clean & Really Works, but AWFUL skin smell!
content: and a toooon of brands here on Amazon that aren't well recognized or established. And most of them left me horribly orange (with the exception of Isles of Paradise- but it doesn't last long and is very tricky to apply evenly). As a result I turned to the standard beauty industries top sunless tanners filled with drying/aging chemicals and toxins. And even a ton of those turned me crazy orange, streaky or just didn't wear off nicely (patchy).  But like I said, I have a very yellow/golden undertone to my skin so bronzers are amplified much stronger on my skin.  But even still, my skin was just starting for feel icky. So I when I went to order more of my tinted SPF I decided why not give their sunless tanner a try since all the ingredients are things I'd actually want to put on skin. And wow!!! In love!!! And not even kidding, I can get a full two weeks out of one application if I prep right and continue to moisturize! I've even revamped an old tan by adding a tiny bit of this tanning lotions to their regular lotion and used it as a gradual tanner or tanner extender! Not even exaggerating! Prep is key of course!!!! And I don't shave or use any detergents in my shower, so that may help. I wax once or twice a month with natural sugar wax and only use organic African black soap and cowash my hair- so no harsh detergents and perfumes running down my skin in the shower. I truly believe that helps with the condition of my tan. I use the scrubbing mitten the night before (so important not the day of!!!!) to exfoliate and don't get lazy with it- really scrub!!! I wax right after exfoliation if needed while my pores are still open (reduces ingrown hairs and hairs just snapping before the root). Then wait a full 24hrs to let the pores totally close and micro heal. The only prep the day of that is needed is just cleaning the skin with gentle/natural clarifying soap to make sure that there is no oils or residue on the skin. But absolutely no scrubbing the day off, always the night before! I use the application mitt and use the white lotion as a guide of sorts. It will disappear by time your on the other leg/arm- no need to rub it all in! Just use it like a guide. For ankles, knees, wrist, underarms, I flip over mitt to the clean side and gently blend from the adjoining body part down. I do NOT add any more lotion on joints. That will not turn out nearly as natural looking. I wait about 10 minutes then put on loose full coverage PJs and go to bed. The next morning I look amazing!! If I messed up anywhere or see a spot needing blending, showering and gently, gently, gently scrubbing the first morning is the best time. I've had so many compliments on this tan and people being so surprised when they see how pale I actually am without it. Lol
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2024

content: Does not specify face for some reason. I believe it's safe for the entire body.
